humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides a measurement of the largest tumor size, which is 1.6 cm. According to the rules provided, T1 tumors are 2 cm or less in size. Therefore, the pathologic T stage of the patient's cancer is T1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the invasive ductal carcinoma measures 1.6 cm (T1c) in the left breast. The synoptic report also confirms the T stage as pT 1c. The T stage is determined by the size of the tumor, and in this case, the size is within the T1 range (less than or equal to 2 cm). Therefore, the T stage from this report is T1.
